string-array.name: getting_started_title
string-array.item: AgKit Mobile
Getting Started
Supply Power
Turn AgKit On
Startup Time
Connect to WiFi Network
Select Startup Mode
Choose Configuration
Connect to ROS Network
Setup Complete
SSH
Debug

string-array.name: getting_started_descr
string-array.item: AgKit-Mobile is an Android application designed for dynamic control and visualization of the AgKit robot.
The remainder of these slides explain how to get up and running with AgKit and this app.
Connect power source to the powerjack (12V, 15A).
Turn on the power switch (Manually adjust the camera position and hold. after being powered the camera will be fixed).
Wait the system boot (~2 min), all LED lights and the indication LED should be on. (If not, reboot).
Connect this tablet to the \"kit-desktop\" WiFi that is published by the AgKit.
After these introductory slides, select \"START WITH CUSTOM CONFIGURATIONS\" for general use or \"CREATE CUSTOM CONFIGURATION\" for advanced use.
Select the menu button at the top left of the screen. Choose a predefined configuration from the list or create your own in the \"DETAILS\" tab.
Navigate to the \"MASTER\" Tab. Enter Master URL and Port for AgKit (If different than defaults). Press \"CONNECT\". The button should become red and change to \"DISCONNECT\".
Navigate to the \"VIZ\" Tab to see the results. Each time you change to a different config, you will need to reconnect to the AgKit in the "MASTER" tab.
For more technical users, there is also a built in SSH tab that allows you to connect to the AgKit directly.
If you are having problems, the \"debug\" widget and/or predefined configuration may help.
